html: The Senate has a choice to make: Keep America's borders open to those with no regard for our laws, or secure our border and keep the Government open and working for the American people. It's straightforward, it's common sense, and it's urgent.
text:
The Senate has a choice to make: Keep America's borders open to those with no regard for our laws, or secure our border and keep the Government open and working for the American people. 

It's straightforward, it's common sense, and it's urgent.

@POTUS is delivering! #jobs

html: Important #Florence safety tips courtesy of @NCEmergency and @FEMA: STAY INDOORS. Do not venture out during the storm. Do NOT drive or walk through stagnant or moving floodwaters. Do NOT operate gas powered generators or charcoal grills in or near your home.#ncwx #scwxpic.twitter.com/fi6aVVp4P7
text:
Important #Florence safety tips courtesy of @NCEmergency and @FEMA:

STAY INDOORS. Do not venture out during the storm.
Do NOT drive or walk through stagnant or moving floodwaters. 
Do NOT operate gas powered generators or charcoal grills in or near your home.#ncwx #scwxpic.twitter.com/fi6aVVp4P7

html: As #Florence reveals herself in #SC, Folks, stay indoors and do NOT attempt to drive in floods. Stay away from windows and glass doors. This #Hurricane is a Marathon NOT a sprint! @SCEMD Hotline is open 24/7, if you need assistance please call: 1-866-246-0133

Please share this safety info for #Florence: If trapped in a building, go to the highest floor. Do not climb into a closed attic; you may get trapped by rising floodwater. Get on the roof only if necessary. Call 9-1-1 for emergencies.pic.twitter.com/Hna2aGpmMP
text:
Please share this safety info for #Florence:
If trapped in a building, go to the highest floor.
Do not climb into a closed attic; you may get trapped by rising floodwater.
Get on the roof only if necessary.

Call 9-1-1 for emergencies.pic.twitter.com/Hna2aGpmMP

html: Good disaster-survival tips: -Fill washing machines with ice to create coolers. -Fill the bathtub with water (for toilets, drinking, washing). -Leaving? Put a coin on top of the ice in the freezer to see if the power went out. -Use crayons as candles. (h/t @wis10)pic.twitter.com/sPGWjxXsGw
text:
Good disaster-survival tips:
-Fill washing machines with ice to create coolers.
-Fill the bathtub with water (for toilets, drinking, washing). 
-Leaving? Put a coin on top of the ice in the freezer to see if the power went out.
-Use crayons as candles.
(h/t @wis10)pic.twitter.com/sPGWjxXsGw

html: It is #WastefulWednesday, and today I introduced a bill that would prohibit HHS from studying the impact of cigar flavors. HHS awarded more than $100,000 of taxpayer dollars to research how the flavor of a cigar related to the likelihood of young adults beginning to smoke.

html: The FLY Act would not only provide greater transparency for the American people, prevent those in high-level positions from abusing power, but it will also save hard-earned dollars in the long run.
text: The FLY Act would not only provide greater transparency for the American people, prevent those in high-level positions from abusing power, but it will also save hard-earned dollars in the long run.

html: By requiring the heads of the agencies to report their travel, those in power will be held accountable for how they utilize taxpayer dollars, encouraging them to do so efficiently and not abuse their position by going on luxurious trips.
text: By requiring the heads of the agencies to report their travel, those in power will be held accountable for how they utilize taxpayer dollars, encouraging them to do so efficiently and not abuse their position by going on luxurious trips.

html: Last week I introduced the Formally List Your Travel (FLY) Act which would require all federal agency heads to submit their official travel logs to the Government Accountability Office on a more regular basis and restrict them from flying first-class.https://washex.am/2l2NnFf

html: No private organization should be given taxpayer $$$ to use. The Asia Foundation was founded in 1954, and functioned prior to receiving funds from the federal government.This is just another example of how Washington has developed the awful habit of throwing money down the drain.
text: No private organization should be given taxpayer $$$ to use. The Asia Foundation was founded in 1954, and functioned prior to receiving funds from the federal government.This is just another example of how Washington has developed the awful habit of throwing money down the drain.

html: In FY 2017, the Asia Foundation’s budget was $100 million dollars. $83 million came from the private sector, and $17 million came from taxpayers. If this private, non-profit organization can raise $83 million, then why must taxpayers foot an extra $17 million? That is ludicrous.
text: In FY 2017, the Asia Foundation’s budget was $100 million dollars. $83 million came from the private sector, and $17 million came from taxpayers. If this private, non-profit organization can raise $83 million, then why must taxpayers foot an extra $17 million? That is ludicrous.

html: You know what day it is... #WastefulWednesday! Today, I introduced a bill to prohibit any federal agency from providing funds to The Asia Foundation, a private, non-profit international development organization.
text: You know what day it is... #WastefulWednesday! Today, I introduced a bill to prohibit any federal agency from providing funds to The Asia Foundation, a private, non-profit international development organization.

html: This bill would take many of the individual tax cuts and provisions from #TaxReform and make them permanent for our troops.
text: This bill would take many of the individual tax cuts and provisions from #TaxReform and make them permanent for our troops.

html: Today, in honor of Military Appreciation Month, I introduced the "Permanently Amending Tax Cuts for our Heroes Act" or the PATCH Act.
text: Today, in honor of Military Appreciation Month, I introduced the "Permanently Amending Tax Cuts for our Heroes Act" or the PATCH Act.

html: We must get the AFTERR Appropriations Act to @POTUS' desk ASAP to help rein in this reckless spending.
text: We must get the AFTERR Appropriations Act to @POTUS' desk ASAP to help rein in this reckless spending.

html: This bill fixes the major flaw that has prevented the President’s current rescission authority from serving as a valuable mechanism for controlling spending.
text: This bill fixes the major flaw that has prevented the President’s current rescission authority from serving as a valuable mechanism for controlling spending.

html: Our budget process is broken. That's why I have introduced H.R. 5442, A Fast-Tracked Executive Rescission Review (AFTERR) of Appropriations Act. By creating an expedited process for WH recission requests, Congress would be forced to justify their most egregious pet projects.
text: Our budget process is broken. That's why I have introduced H.R. 5442, A Fast-Tracked Executive Rescission Review (AFTERR) of Appropriations Act. By creating an expedited process for WH recission requests, Congress would be forced to justify their most egregious pet projects.
